concept.definition: Cancel, reverse or nullify the target resource.
Check for previously un-read/ not-retrieved resources.
Retrieve the processing status of the target resource.

description: List of allowable action which this resource can request.
name: ActionList

text.div:
ActionList

List of allowable action which this resource can request.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/actionlist defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
cancel Cancel, Reverse or NullifyCancel, reverse or nullify the target resource.
poll PollCheck for previously un-read/ not-retrieved resources.
reprocess Re-ProcessRe-process the target resource.
status Status CheckRetrieve the processing status of the target resource.
